title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on UK Trade Agreements
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Secretary of State for International Trade, on 8 December 2021.
content:
The 2019 Conservative manifesto promised to negotiate a number of free trade agreements, including with the United States, within three years.
